security: Disclosing the identities and operational details of JMWAVE assets could compromise ongoing intelligence activities and endanger the individuals involved. Additionally, revealing salary information and bonus structures could expose operational funding mechanisms.
summary: A dispatch from the Chief of Station, JMWAVE, regarding an amendment to the Memorandum of Oral Commitment (MOC) for an individual (Subject of 201-332676), increasing their monthly salary from $150.00 to $200.00 net due to the Subject having a total of three dependents.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET dispatch, UFGA-17818, dated September 25, 1964, from the Chief of Station at JMWAVE to the Deputy Chief, WH/SA, concerns an amendment to the Memorandum of Oral Commitment (MOC) for an individual referred to as the 'Subject of 201-332676'. The amendment authorizes a raise in the Subject's monthly salary from $150.00 to $200.00 net, reflecting the Subject's status as having three dependents. The dispatch includes copies of the amended MOC and an IDEN sheet, with instructions for the addressee to record the amendment.
title: TYPIC/Operational MOC Amendment for Subject of 201-332676
